name: Amrat sari fried fish Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Amrat sari fried fish Recipe: Boneless fish fillet 500 gm cut into fingers Salt 1 tsp Lemon juice 1 tbsp Crushed red pepper 1 tsp Turmeric ¼ tsp Ingredients for batter Flour 3 tbsp Corn flour 4 tbsp Rice flour 2 tbsp Gram flour 2 tbsp Egg 1 Ginger garlic paste 1 tsp Salt ½ tsp Chili powder 1 tsp Yellow color pinch Water to make batter Chat masala ½ tsp
instructions: Marinate fish with salt, turmeric, crushed red pepper, lemon juice and gram flour for 30 minutes wash well to remove all smell. Mix together all the ingredients for batter in a bowl and make it into a pouring consistency batter. Add fish in it, deep fry to a golden color on low heat till golden and crisp. Sprinkle chat masala, serve hot with chatni.
